Rihanna isn't shy about flaunting her sensational figure.

And the Diamonds hitmaker stripped off for one of her sexiest posts to date to promote new The Rihanna Book on Instagram on Friday.

The songstress, 31, peeled off her clothes to reveal her naked figure, yet she used her huge book to cover her modesty for the snap.

Rihanna raked a free hand through her raven-coloured mane to show off her pretty features.

Giving her look the showbiz sparkle, the pop star decorated her body with rings and watches as well as a string of pearls.

Surrounded by fresh pink roses and orchids, the singer added a bright lipstick and tinted shades to ensure she stood out against the colourful background.

Rihanna also kept two orange roses close to her chest while she posed in the nude.

The chart-topper invited her dearest admirers into her world with her visual autobiography.

(Image: Getty Images)

It includes stunning snaps from her childhood in Barbdos to her global tours and top fashion moments.

Fans will also get a glimmer of her private life as she peppered the book with pictures from moments with her family and friends.

She wrote in the caption: "It’s crazy to look back at all of the memories and be able to share these precious moments with you!"

The Rihanna book is filled with more than 1000 images of the star and it is across 504 pages.

It hit bookshelves on Friday, making her snaps readily accessible to her loyal fans.

The singer has a huge fan base and she has 76.5million dedicated followers on Instagram.
